name: Reactor Defender [TriJam 159]
description:
Entry for TriJam 159 - More than One. 

Select a number of towers to defend a reactor from attack. Move your mouse to fire from the towers, but beware not to hit the reactor from your own bullets.

This is my first game using ScriptableObject so it longer to develop and has a few bugs to fix later.

Update, Fixed bunch of bugs, but still  some known bugs:

  • The score does reset, but updates after the first kill
  • Selecting 4 towers only shows 3 towers
